actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 with respect to the entitlement under such act of certain surviving spouses of railroad employees.

summary.text: Provides that whenever a retired employee receives an annuity under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 that is larger than the amount that would be payable to a surviving spouse of such employee, the amount payable to such spouse shall be recomputed in accordance with specified provisions of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 with respect to the entitlement under such act of certain surviving spouses of railroad employees.
